definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong1 shang1 Yin2 hang2

definition: "the four classes" of ancient China, i.e. scholars, farmers, artisans, and merchants

pinyin: gong1 shang1 guan3 li3 shuo4 shi4

definition: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

sentences.english: The fourth section analysis the literary work of people who walk into political field by examination.
sentences.chinese: 第四节分析评述科举入仕之工商子弟的文学创作活动。

sentences.english: The government decapitalized industry and commerce with harsh tax policies.
sentences.chinese: 该政府通过苛刻的税收政策从工商界抽取资本。

sentences.english: The administrative departments of industry and commerce at all levels shall be responsible for the administration of famous trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 各级工商行政管理部门负责著名商标的管理工作。

sentences.english: Application for Registration of Increased Capital.
sentences.chinese: 办理增资扩股工商注册的请示。

sentences.english: You can deposit the cash in any branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank.
sentences.chinese: 现金可交到任何一家工商银行分理处。

sentences.english: Yesterday, city industrial and commercial bureau was announced electronic business affairs superintended a circumstance last year.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，市工商局公布了去年电子商务监管情况。

sentences.english: I tried to take several business classes, but my salary was very low.
sentences.chinese: 我争取上一些工商管理的课程，但是我的工资很低。

sentences.english: We learned of your company through the Chamber of Commerce and Industry in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 我们通过东京工商会了解贵公司。

sentences.english: Commerce and Industry, is now registered in the country.
sentences.chinese: 现已在国家工商局注册。

sentences.english: In 1999, he finished his study from the School of Business Administration of Dongbei University of Finance & Economics with master degree.
sentences.chinese: 年毕业于东北财经大学工商管理学院，获硕士学位。

sentences.english: First, one can listen to what businesspeople say.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你可以去听听工商界人士怎么说。

sentences.english: The number of enterprises at yearend refer to the enterprises registered at Industry and Commerce Administrative Department.
sentences.chinese: 年末实有企业指在工商行政管理部门登记注册的企业。

sentences.english: The Master of Business Administration program will cost about 38000 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 工商管理硕士研究生需要交纳三万八千美元的学费。

sentences.english: At the same time, it shall report to the administrative department at the provincial level where it is located.
sentences.chinese: 同时，抄报其所在地省级工商行政管理部门。

sentences.english: Muckraking journalists denounced the titans of American business as "robber barons".
sentences.chinese: 八卦记者曾将美国工商业巨头直斥为“强盗头目”。

sentences.english: Business Process Reengineering(BPR)is known as revolutions in business management area.
sentences.chinese: 企业业务流程再造被誉为工商管理的一次革命。

definition: local government bylaw enforcement officer/city management (abbr. for 城市管理行政執法局|城市管理行政执法局[Cheng2 shi4 Guan3 li3 Xing2 zheng4 Zhi2 fa3 ju2])
